rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0001
rows.name:
What a sight...
This is quite an impressive vessel.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0002
rows.name:
Satahiko,
so you're interested in
Divine Beast battleships as well?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't care much for the Divine Beast
aspect, but the mechanical parts
really intrigue me.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0004
rows.name:
Looking at things like this
gets you excited, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0005
rows.name:
It makes me want
to tinker with it.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0006
rows.name: Ootsuchi will help out?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0007
rows.name: Yeah, leave it to me!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0008
rows.name: What should I say about Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0009
rows.name: You seem good at carrying heavy things.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0010
rows.name: Are you actually good with delicate work?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0011
rows.name: What should I say about Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0012
rows.name: I bet you're good at heavy lifting.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0013
rows.name: Are you secretly good at detailed work?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0014
rows.name: What should I say about Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0015
rows.name: You seem well-suited to manual labor.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0016
rows.name: Are you skilled with precision work?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0017
rows.name: What should I say about Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0018
rows.name: Ya seem good at carryin' heavy stuff.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0019
rows.name: Are ya actually dexterous?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0101
rows.name: Are you mocking me?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0102
rows.name:
That's just stating the obvious,
isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0103
rows.name:
With this physique,
it'd be shocking if I weren't strong!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0104
rows.name: That's true, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0105
rows.name: Sure, that's true, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0106
rows.name: That may be so, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0107
rows.name: Yeah, I suppose...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0108
rows.name:
You seem to be doubting my strength,
so why don't I give you a demonstration?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0109
rows.name: Let's see...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0110
rows.name: I'll lift that Divine Beast battleship!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0115
rows.name: I...don't think that's possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0116
rows.name: Gahahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0117
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0118
rows.name:
But I could probably handle
that Tortoga over there.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0119
rows.name: Ootsuchi, that's also a bad idea.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0120
rows.name:
If you damage Superbia military property,
we'll all be in serious trouble.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0121
rows.name:
Hmph...
This feels like something
I've seen before.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0122
rows.name: Then how about this?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0123
rows.name: I'll throw my Driver!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0124
rows.name:
I bet I can throw mine farther
than anyone else!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0125
rows.name: Good idea, that.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0126
rows.name:
That way the Superbian military
won't have any complaints.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0127
rows.name: Gahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0128
rows.name:
That settles it!!
Let's go!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0129
rows.name:
No, ah...
Hold on a second...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0130
rows.name:
Hold on!
Wait a minute!!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0131
rows.name:
Wait, please,
let's discuss this rationally...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0132
rows.name:
Wait a sec!
That's no good...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0133
rows.name: Stop making a fuss!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0134
rows.name:
Putting your life in your Blade's hands
is what Drivers do!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0135
rows.name: Hngggh! Hyaaaaahhhh!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0136
rows.name: Aaaaaaah-!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0137
rows.name: Nooooo-!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0138
rows.name: Urghhh-!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0139
rows.name: Stop iiiiiiiiit!!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0140
rows.name:
Phew...
I thought I was going to die.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0141
rows.name:
From now on, let's not talk to Ootsuchi
about physical strength...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0142
rows.name:
Phew...
I'm so glad I'm alive...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0143
rows.name:
Let's never discuss
physical strength with Ootsuchi again...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0144
rows.name:
Whew...
That was a close call...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0145
rows.name:
Perhaps I should avoid bringing up
the topic of strength with
Ootsuchi in the future...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0146
rows.name:
Phew...
I almost wet myself...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0147
rows.name:
I'm never bringing up
physical strength with Ootsuchi again...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0201
rows.name:
That's right,
Ootsuchi is actually quite dexterous,
you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0202
rows.name: Yeah, bet you didn't expect that!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0203
rows.name:
I do get frustrated with tiny screws
about the size of a Nopon's little
finger though.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0204
rows.name:
I can handle almost anything else
no problem.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0205
rows.name:
And that's when I step in
for the precision work.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0206
rows.name: I see!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0207
rows.name:
So Satahiko works on the precision
components, while Ootsuchi handles
the larger parts...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0208
rows.name: You make a good team.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0209
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0210
rows.name:
So Sata works on the precision pieces,
while Ootsuchi takes care
of the heavy lifting...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0211
rows.name: You made a good team.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0212
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0213
rows.name:
Satahiko manages the detailed work,
while Ootsuchi deals with
the heavy components...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0214
rows.name: You complement each other well.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0215
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0216
rows.name:
Satahiko handles the detailed work,
while Ootsuchi tackles the big stuff...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0217
rows.name: Ya work together real well!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0218
rows.name: Well, I guess...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0219
rows.name: Gahahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0220
rows.name:
Just leave everything to the invincible
me! I can handle it all!
